All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
AdminActivity
Activity class that handles administration actions such as displaying reports and showing the ban count for a specific user.
AllTimeFragment
A Fragment subclass that represents the all-time leaderboard.
AppController
 
ArtistActivity
ArtistActivity is an AppCompatActivity that handles the functionality related to artists, including searching, adding, updating, and deleting artists and songs using network requests.
ChatActivity
ChatActivity provides the user interface and logic for a chat application.
Const
 
GameControllerInterface
Interface for controlling game flow in an Android application.
GameState
Represents the state of a game, including details about the lobby, players, and their respective game boards.
GameViewInterface
Interface defining the required methods for a game view.
GameWebSockets
GameWebSockets is an AppCompatActivity that manages WebSocket connections for a multiplayer game.
LeaderboardActivity
LeaderboardActivity is an AppCompatActivity that displays a leaderboard in a ListView.
LobbyActivity
LobbyActivity is an AppCompatActivity that serves as a main menu for a game application.
LruBitmapCache
 
MainActivity
MainActivity is the entry point for the application.
MonthlyFragment
MonthlyFragment is a subclass of Fragment used to represent the monthly leaderboard.
MultiPlayerGame
Represents the multiplayer game activity where two players interact with a game board, answer questions, and compete against each other.
MultiPlayerGame.AnswerCheckCallback
 
Navigation
Navigation helper class used to add a navigation drawer to an activity.
PlayerBoard
The PlayerBoard class represents a board object used in the Android application.
PlayerData
The PlayerData class represents player data in the Android application.
ReportUserActivity
The ReportUserActivity class represents an activity for reporting users in the Android application.
sendBoard
The sendBoard class represents a board object used in the Android application.
SettingsActivity
Class is meant to store settings of users and attach it to there account NOT IMPLEMENTED
ShopActivity
The ShopActivity class represents the main activity for the shopping functionality in the Android application.
SinglePlayerGame
Represents the single-player game activity where a player interacts with the game board, answers questions, and competes against the timer to earn points.
SinglePlayerGame.AnswerCheckCallback
 
StudyActivity
Class used for the study activity to test the user against data in the database
WebSocketListener
Interface defining methods for handling WebSocket events.
WebSocketManager
Singleton WebSocketManager instance used for managing WebSocket connections in the Android application.
WeeklyFragment
Currently Not implemented, will display weekly leaderboard.
